summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Thackery Place from East 45th Street to East 50th Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing under Ordinance No. 15079, creating Local Improvement District No. 1371 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
